text: King Stag () is a 1969 Soviet movie directed by Pavel Arsenov.Король-олень (1969) It stars Yury Yakovlev, Valentina Malyavina, and Sergey Yursky. == Actors == * Yury Yakovlev as Deramo * Valentina Malyavina as Angela * Sergey Yursky as Tartaglia * Vladimir Shlesinger as Pantalone * Oleg Tabakov as Chigolotti * Oleg Yefremov as Durandarte * Elena Solovey as Clarice == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1969 movies
title: King Stag
